pages.text: These will slowly grow over time and produce $(l:items/silk_cocoon)cocoons$().$(br2)They do not spawn in any specific biome, nor can they be bred, but you can hatch them from eggs. See over for egg drop locations.

pages.name: 蠶
pages.text: You can manually feed them leaves by right-clicking to speed the process up.

Leaves fed to a silkworm increase the number of silk cocoons dropped as well as speeding up the process.$(br2)Silkworms do not spawn naturally, nor can they be bred, but can be hatched from eggs (with a chance of success).$(br2)Eggs can be found by breaking leaves in the same way you would to get saplings.
